reviewText: As a therapist I often recommend different books, Cd's, DVD's, tools to help clients in their life process. Today I am watching the DVD to review the process before teaching it again. Thought I better stop and make sure it is accessible to my clients. So glad to see it is! Simple but very powerful tapping techniques to lift you emotionally and get back into the present flow of life.
Great dvd! It's a wonderful way to use eft or tapping to the positive.

Useful application of Emotional Freedom Training technique that is adapted for multiple applications, such as dieting, sleep and boosting positive energy.  I have used it effectively with a number of veterans suffering from PTSD to help alleviate anxiety.
